column4: i have a very serious question so i need everyones attention who knows:    I have a small network of ubuntus,   and when we play gnometris, id like it so we all see each others high scores, how do i do this?
write them on a whiteboard where everyone can see? =)
I don't know how gnometris does it's high scores.. but you might be able to share a drive with the gnometris files on.. and you all run it from the same folder.. but I'm just guessing here
check if there is a .gnometris folder in your home folder.. that's one way of doing it
